data.question: What is the chemical formula of the metal-organic framework discussed?
What is the BET surface area of Cr3(BTC)2 as determined by nitrogen gas adsorption measurements at 77 K?
What is the selectivity factor of Cr3(BTC)2 for O2 over N2 at 298 K?
What temperature and time are optimal for releasing O2 to regenerate Cr3(BTC)2?
How does the Cr-Cr distance change upon coordination of O2 in Cr3(BTC)2?
What is the O2 loading capacity of Cr3(BTC)2 at 2 mbar?
What happens to the O2 loading capacity of Cr3(BTC)2 after repeated adsorption/desorption cycles?
Is the O2 binding in Cr3(BTC)2 reversible?
Does Cr3(BTC)2 have a higher selectivity for O2 over N2 compared to cobalt(II) complexes?
Is the O2/N2 selectivity factor of Cr3(BTC)2 the highest ever reported for metal-organic frameworks?
Does heating Cr3(BTC)2 at 160 °C under vacuum for 48 h lead to its desolvation?
Is the Cr3(BTC)2 framework damaged irreversibly after O2 desorption?
Does Cr3(BTC)2 lose surface area after two cycles of O2 adsorption-desorption?
Can Cr3(BTC)2 selectively adsorb O2 over N2 at room temperature?
What spectroscopic technique was used to probe the interaction between Cr3(BTC)2 and O2?
What is the role of Cr(II) centers in the selective uptake of O2 in Cr3(BTC)2?
data.answer: Engage in charge transfer interactions with O2

data.question: What structural change occurs in Cr3(BTC)2 upon O2 adsorption?
data.answer: Formation of an O2 adduct with partial charge transfer from the Cr(II) centers

data.question: Is the adsorption of O2 in Cr3(BTC)2 based on physical adsorption?
Does the Cr3(BTC)2 framework maintain its structure upon O2 desorption?
What is the impact of O2 adsorption on the color of Cr3(BTC)2?
data.answer: Turns from yellow-green to deep forest green
